entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 06:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
